main.desc1: Accounting Office Wiesław Harbuz has been on the market for several years.
main.desc2: Our experience and competitive prices of our services make us have many regular and satisfied customers.
main.desc3: I have knowledge supported by many years of work experience in the tax office.

services.title: We provide the following services:
services.desc3: assistance in obtaining tax refunds for work abroad (in the following countries: Germany, Belgium, Austria, USA, Netherlands, UK, Ireland, Australia, Denmark, Norway or Sweden)
services.desc4: management of income and expense books (KPIR)
services.desc8: HR and payroll services, Social Security
services.desc9: assistance with official letters and letters to the courts
services.desc10: assistance in setting up your own business
services.desc11: other accounting and legal services that can be discussed individually with the client

ending.title: On the territory of the city of Tomaszów Lubelski it is possible to perform services at the customer's home.
ending.desc1: Use the services of Wiesław Harbuz Accounting Office today!
ending.desc2: We will help reliably, professionally and at an affordable price.

consent_to_data_processing.desc1: I consent to the processing of personal data in accordance with the Law on Personal Data Protection in connection with sending an inquiry via the contact form.
consent_to_data_processing.desc2: Provision of data is voluntary, but necessary to process the request.
consent_to_data_processing.desc3: I have been informed that I have the right to access my data, the opportunity to correct them, to request the cessation of their processing.
consent_to_data_processing.desc4_1: The administrator of the personal data is
consent_to_data_processing.desc4_2: Accounting office Wiesław Harbuz, Poland 22-600 Tomaszów Lubelski Rolicza 10 St

section_mail.error_send_message: An error occurred while sending the message. Try again later or send the message from your webmail.
